text: Natasha Gregson Wagner (born September 29 1970) is an American television and movie actress from Los Angeles. She is the daughter of actress Natalie Wood. She starred in the 1992 comedy Buffy the Vampire Slayer alongside Kristy Swanson. She also starred in the television series ER for several episodes. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Natasha Gregson Wagner
